oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dickinson. Perez Dickinson, ca. 1893.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McCrary & Branson, Knoxville, TN
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Perez Dickinson (February 25, 1813-July 17, 1901) taken at age 80, ca. 1893. Taken by McCrary & Branson, Knoxville, TN. Perez Dickinson was a partner in the Knoxville mercantile business Cowan and Dickinson and the owner of Island Home farm, his country estate about a mile from downtown Knoxville.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Staffs (Sticks); Flower arrangements;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
